item.description:
I'm coming back from vacation on Monday, so this Tuesday evening walk is pretty simple. Start at Copley, go down Beacon St until we hit Cleveland Circle. This is 4.09 miles according to Google maps.

I'm starting it at 7pm so I'm not in a rush to get there, like I was for the last walk. The Sox are playing at Cleveland, so don't worry about that.

Here's the map.
item.how_to_find_us: Copley Park, at the benches on Dartmouth st facing the library.
item.name: Copley to Cleveland Circle, via Beacon St. (4mi.)
